Class Customer

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a customer in the flight booking system. Maintains customer details and their booking history.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(int id, String name, String phone, String email, String password)
      Constructs a new Customer with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier for the customer
      name - customer's full name
      phone - customer's phone number
      email - customer's email address
      password - customer's login password

    • isDeleted

      public boolean isDeleted()
      Returns:
      true if the customer has been soft-deleted, false otherwise

    • getBookings

      public List<Booking> getBookings()
      Returns:
      a defensive copy of the customer's booking list

    • setDeleted

      public void setDeleted(boolean deleted)
      Updates the customer's deleted status.
      Parameters:
      deleted - true to mark as deleted, false otherwise

    • addBooking

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(Booking booking)

      Parameters:
      booking - the booking to remove

    • getDetailsShort

      public String getDetailsShort()
      Returns a short string representation of the customer's details.
      Returns:
      a string containing customer ID, name, phone, and email
